scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:lambdas
scripts.clean:lambdas: find ./lambdas -maxdepth 1 -type d -not -name lambdas -exec sh -c 'npm run --prefix "$1" clean' _ {} \;
scripts.test: find ./lambdas -type d -maxdepth 1 -not -name lambdas -exec sh -c 'npm run --prefix "$1" test' _ {} \;
